net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.network

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.network.Network
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client, Server

    public abstract class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is used to represent a Network connection.
    Since:
    Apr 26, 2013 at 11:04:11 PM, v0.1
    Version:
    Apr 26, 2013 at 11:04:11 PM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak
